required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Demonstration of the "SPECT/CT System With CZT Detectors" Imaging Performance in a Clinical Setting
clinical_study.official_title: Demonstration of the "SPECT/CT System With CZT Detectors" Imaging Performance in a Clinical Setting

brief_summary.textblock: The primary purpose of the study is to obtain sample clinical images that are evaluated by physicians in support of regulatory submissions. Additionally, the study will provide data for current and future product development and it will provide clinical images and data for marketing use.

primary_outcome.description: Diagnostic Image Quality will be rated by 2 radiologist using a 5 point Likert Scale
Image Resolution will be rated by 2 radiologist using a 5 point Likert Scale

arm_group.arm_group_label: Subjects indicated for dynamic nuclear medicine scanning
arm_group.description: The trial will consist of a single arm composed of subjects with preexisting indications for dynamic nuclear medicine scanning at the site. All patients will undergo nuclear medicine scintigraphy using the GE Discovery 670 NM/CT device with and without CZT enabled during a single visit.

intervention.description: At a single visit, subjects will undergo nuclear medicine scintigraphy imaging scanning on the investigational GE Discovery 670 NM/CT CZT (with CZT) device and the commercial GE Discovery 670c (without CZT).
intervention.arm_group_label: Subjects indicated for dynamic nuclear medicine scanning
